question: The reason that most people are in debt is the overuse as well as irresponsible use of credit cards. Banks ought to do a background check and only issue credit cards to individuals who have the ability to pay back their debts.What is your opinion?
text: In my opinion, blaming careless use of credit cards as the sole basis of huge loans is completely preposterous. There are several factors like student debt and lack of financial education in schools that are a major contributing cause to the above issues. This essay will discuss why loans have become such a debatable topic.

Firstly, education borrowings from financial institutions is one of the primary reasons for the huge  mess . For example, with ever increasing university fees about half of the students are in debt. Secondly, schools do not teach students on how to manage money and various aspects related to it. As a result, children when turn into adults have no clue on investing and planning for there future monetary needs.

However, credit cards do play a small role in the current situation. As people have unlimited access of money with just a swipe. Furthermore, consumers start buying things which are not required them. For instance, according to a recent survey about 60% of citizens buy things on  which they actually never use. The situation is alarming in nature and will lead to multiple problems for banks as well as the government.

In conclusion, we are heading towards a bubble which can burst anytime soon. The government should not only conduct free classes on how to handle money but also talk to various universities to review their tuition fees. Focusing on just reducing credit bills and introducing background verification will not solve the problem at hand as the other areas need to be understood and handled as well.
